media:group.media:title: 5 Tips For Wet Weather Cycling
media:group.media:description:
For a lot of us, if it's raining we simply choose not to go out on our bikes, but there are those that commute by bike and have no choice, or you could get caught out in a freak rain storm! Either way, it's a good idea to know how to cycle in wet weather so that you are prepared for the slippery and unpredictable conditions. Hank gives you five tips on mastering wet weather riding.

Chapters:
0:00 - Intro
0:48 - Tyre Choice & Pressure
2:40 - Choose Your Line
3:48 - Take Extra Care
4:43 - Drag Your Brakes
5:48 - Learn The Conditions
